name: Turtle Town (Sarah.Games, Miranda-gamedev)
description:
Project for a Serious Games Jam, for presentation purposes only. 

All amazing artwork by Miranda Game Dev - https://miranda-gamedev.itch.io/

All of the awesome programming by Sarah - https://sarahdotgames.itch.io/

To pan right-click and drag. To build click on the object, then look to the bottom left of the screen and click once and drag. This will lock the object into place, to move again click once again and drag. Clicking once will also rotate an object.
